divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother phoned me that he was seeing something weird in the sky while he was driving to his girlfriends fathers house for dinner. He asked if I could go outside to see if I could see it from my house. I went onto my back porch and looked in the direction that he indicated. It was due East apparently over the city of Hamel. There were 3 orbs or spheres pulsating in a triangle formation, the did not move but just sat in the same spot. The orbs were pulsating light, and all 3 were in sequense with the others. After one would brighten the others would do so as well in succesion. They remained in same spot for 3-4 mins from the beginning of me seeing them.. after 3 mins they all dissappeared at the same time. I have seen multiple other stange objects in the skies around my house, and I truely believe this to be a hot spot. Total sightings in this area by myself is 7 to 8 different objects, spread over 2 years. Have seen most activity in last 3 months.
trends: There has been one other sighting in New Douglas
There were no other sightings in New Douglas on or around December 17th 2009
